data.name: Super Spyroxo Adventures: Island of Dnfoo
data.detailed_description:
Classic side scroller arcade adventure retro 2d game "Super Spyroxo Adventures: Island of Dnfoo" . This game brings back memories of old school arcade games with numerous adventure. World of this game contains well designed levels, various enemies, bosses, simple gameplay, nice pixelart graphics fun music and sounds.

On beautiful sunny day Spyroxo and his wife Jill were eating apples together and enjoying life and suddenly bad cavemen called "DNFOO" group appeared from deep jungles of the island. These evil mosters captured Spyroxo's wife and ran away. Spyroxo is on adventure to rescue his wife by defeating cavemen & dinosaurs and teach them a lesson.

To bring Spyroxo's wife back he needs your help. Run ,shoot and jump through the different island environments, avoid traps, clear all enemies in your way and defeat all bosses. This game will give you classic feel with side scrolling view, with classic gameplay, simple yet beautiful pixelart graphics, easy and intuitive controls, many weapons, each level with unique graphics and epic boss battles.

data.short_description: Classic side scroller retro arcade adventure 2d game "Super Spyroxo Adventures: Island of Dnfoo". This game brings back memories of old school arcade games with numerous adventures, well designed levels, various enemies, bosses, simple gameplay, nice pixelart graphics and fun music.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Norwegian*, Dutch*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Swedish*, Czech*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 capable GPU, Intel HD Graphics 5100 / AMD Radeon 77XX / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable GPU, Intel Iris Pro 5200 or AMD/Nvidia equivalent for Mac
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHZ or better
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
